pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Brad Penny; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .252 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .298 off him after that.
Brad Penny didn't stick to the scouting report; Carlos Peguero is hitting .000 this season against curveballs in that location.
